refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculates the dot product of two arrays.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Takes two numeric arrays (k or i-rate) and calculates the dot product.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: kres/ires dot karr1[]/iarr1[], karr2[]/iarr2[] (k- or i-arrays )

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
